title: The Specialists
description: When Nichols learns the location of a fortune in stolen money, he assembles a gang of specialists to help him heist it.

title: The One Eyed Mule's Time Has Come
All in the Family
description: The episode begins with Nichols amiably asking a troublemaker named Quinn to pay for damages he caused in the saloon. Quinn shockingly blows him away. After Nichols' funeral the town is shocked when his identical twin brother comes to town, seeking justice,
